name: Montego Star

ingredients.name: Star-shaped lemon peel and edible glitter (optional)

preparation:
You don’t have to be in Montego Bay to cool down with Jane Danger’s surprising and refreshing Jamaican rum cocktail. The recipe is guaranteed to dazzle, whether or not you garnish it with edible glitter.

Add the ingredients to a cocktail shaker, fill with ice and shake.

Strain into a chilled coupe.

Garnish with star-shaped lemon peel.
